subtitle: many may find it difficult to trust in
the omnipresent Spirit which silently
and subtly moves through all things
because we are corporeal manifestations
meaning tangible things and spirit is
the eternally incorporeal meaning beyond
that which we can touch yet seeing that
the word spirit etymologically means
breath we might then consider that to
trust in spirit is to trust in our very
rhythmic breath that we are always
breathing it is through our breath that
we become in touch with the corporeal it
is a bridge for us from one side to the
other so take a moment right now please
to slow down take a few deep breaths and
realize that you are a miracle and an
indivisible part of the cosmic ho of the
harmony that is the
universe
